attributes.action: give us back are equality for this great british nation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: mr g brown i feel like iv been betrade by the goverment of great britian i live in the north east were you feel like nothing is british any more its getting harder to make an honist days work when imigrants can come in to england and go streat on the dole im a hard working pay my taxs i watch immagants on benifts driving better cars then we can buy and govament hand outs makes me sick make britian great again

rejection.details: Please explain what aspect of government policy you wish to comment on.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
